frameDefinitions: A Cognizer_agent attempts to find some Sought_entity by examining some Ground.
An Agent sets down in permanent form information about the occurrence of a Phenomenon.
A member or members of a Class have just been  mentioned or are present in the discourse setting and now a different instance  (or group of instances) of the same class is referred to.
Artists work at various tasks that further the completion of a film, play, television show, or other similar Production.

The words in this frame describe situations in which the Perpetrator has sexual intercourse with the Victim forcibly (or by threatening the use of force) and without his or her consent. '' 'Does the press make it more difficult for raped women to obtain justice?'
In this frame an Agent continues to possess a Theme for a Duration of time. '' 'In her heart she must retain bitterness against those who had killed him.'
frameExamples: While visiting in Port Alberni, the day before he was diagnosed, we <t>recorded</t> him to have 14 drinks and go to the bathroom 10 times.
My husband left me for <t>another</t> woman -- and now wants to get back together again!
Steven Spielberg <t>directed</t> several films for Universal Pictures.
Does the press make it more difficult for <t>raped</t> women to obtain justice?
In her heart she must <t>retain</t> bitterness against those who had killed him.
listRoleDefinitions: The person who attempts to find the Sought_entity.
This is the entity that the <fen>Ground</fen> may contain. Typically, it is expressed as a <ment>for</ment>-PP.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Seeking occurs.
A spatial setting larger than the <fen>Ground</fen> in which the Seeking event occurs.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the sentient entity that creates a permanent record of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the entity or situation in the world of which a <fen>Agent</fen> becomes aware.
That feature of the <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
The <fen>Value</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen> that is recorded for the specified <fen>Attribute</fen>.
An <fen>Entity</fen> for which the <fen>Agent</fen> records the <fen>Value</fen> of an <fen>Attribute</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> creates the record of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> sets down the facts.
The general category of entity which has been referred to.
The instance of the <fen>Class</fen> that is added to the <fen>Initial_set</fen> of entities in the <fen>Class</fen>.
The previously mentioned group of entities of the <fen>Class</fen>.
The <fen>Artist</fen> works off-stage to help make the <fen>Production</fen>.
The <fen>Production</fen> is the final product put out by the off-stage (and on-stage) participants.
An <fen>Artist</fen> may be categorizedy by <fen>Type</fen>.
Often (especially with film or television) the <fen>Production</fen> is advertised and transmitted to the audience by the <fen>Distributor</fen>.
This role indicates the particular orgainzaion that makes the <fen>Production</fen>.
This role indicates the <fen>Medium</fen> in which a particular <fen>Artist</fen> works or a <fen>Production</fen> is made.
In screen performances, the <fen>Performer</fen> is filmed as he or she acts out a role with respect to the larger <fen>Production</fen>
The music which may be performed in the performance of the <fen>Production</fen>, either in isolation or accompanying actions and speech.
A <fen>Scene</fen> is a sub-part of a larger production.  In film, scenes are sometimes recorded independently, and later edited into the final movie.
This role indicates the time when the <fen>Production</fen> is made.
This role indicates the location of production.
This is the person who forces another person to have sexual intercourse with him or her against the other person's will.
This is the person who is forced to engage in sexual intercourse against his or her will.
The rape of a <fen>Victim</fen> by the <fen>Perpetrator</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The person who has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The entity which the <fen>Agent</fen> possesses for a <fen>Duration</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> keeps the <fen>Theme</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>John</fex> looked for his pencil.
Leslie examined the glass <fex>for cracks</fex>.
The police were hunting for evidence in my house <fex>yesterday</fex>
<fex>In Paris</fex> police were hunting for suspects in two of the city's southerns suburbs today
Police informed Mr Wong that <fex>they</fex> recorded the attack as a racial incident.
Adams took some very good advice and meticulously recorded <fex>the events that ensued</fex>.

When Mohammed was sentenced to death in the Anti-Terrorism Court in Rawalpindi
the court recorded <fex>his age</fex> as  17 or 18.

In the fiscal year 2000, Nepal's imports from China and Tibet were recorded <fex>at
166.6 million dollars</fex>.
At the time the Army recorded <fex>him</fex> as a married resident of the Town of Two Creeks.
From what the book says, these events were recorded <fex>in the Chamber of Mazarbul</fex> .
My Husband left me for another <fex>man</fex>!
There was <fex><t>another</t> power outage</fex> today.
A further five incursions <fex>over and above those noted for 1995</fex> took place in the first three months of 1996.
<fex>John Williams</fex> composed the soundtrack to Star Wars.
Ralph Smith produced <fex>the off-Broadway hit 'Why Is My Name Ralph?'</fex>.
<fex>Hollywood</fex> director
Even desperate producers would never produce a film <fex>for that television station</fex>.
The latest performance produced <fex>by The Umbrella Thesbians</fex> was a major hit in France.
He produces <fex>for television</fex>
This particular scene was shot <fex>with a local choir and dancers</fex>.
Silence of the Lambs was filmed <fex>in 1991</fex>.
The documentary was shot <fex>on location</fex>.
The lawyer said the woman was raped <fex>on a night of madness</fex>
At all times <fex>the Saxon government</fex> held on to its insistently practiced political tradition.
Once you've got a War Bond, hang on to <fex>it</fex> for the full ten years of its life.
Margerite held on to the key <fex>on Wednesday</fex> until I returned to pick it up.
He will retain <fex>in his heart</fex> the memory of the vast Holocaust.
